misc: Waters the course more than the course sprinklers.
biography: Pekka, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, hails from Espoo Ringside Golf and is known for his meticulous attention to detail, both on and off the course. Sources say that he regularly waters the course more than the course sprinklers.

With six past appearances and one Hector Trophée victory to his name, Pekka brings a wealth of experience to the competition. Though the Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, his unwavering dedication suggests that he will be a formidable contender at the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, marking his seventh appearance.

Beyond his achievements, Pekka is appreciated for his calm demeanor and sportsmanship. His fellow competitors hold him in high regard, knowing that he is someone who takes the game of golf seriously and always honors its traditions.
